video:video.video:title: Windows Live Essentials 2011 - Available Now

video:video.video:description: The Windows Live team has released a new version of the Messenger 2011 beta with integrated Facebook chat.Link your Windows Live ID with your Facebook account and you'll be able to chat with friends&#8230;

video:video.video:title: Countdown to PDC10: Theres one pass left! Is your name on it?
